text: -- or to family and friends who have authorization to help someone with Medicare questions. To get the most up-to-date SHIP telephone numbers, call 1-800-Medicare (1-800-633-4227) or visit http://www.medicare.gov. (TTY users should call 1-877-486-2048.) Under ""Search Tools,"" select ""Find Helpful Phone Numbers and Websites."" For information about enrolling in Medicare Part A or Part B, visit http://www.medicare.gov and view a copy of ""Medicare & You."" (Under ""Search Tools,"" select ""Find
